title: Charley's War, Volume 3: 17 October 1916 - 21 February 1917
description: Renowned UK comics writer Pat Mills and legendary artist Joe Colquhoun continue the critically-acclaimed classic comics story of World War One soldier Charley Bourne.As the winter of 1916 approaches, Charley is caught in a desperate fight for survival against the Judgment Troopers'. Injured in battle, he returns home to convalesce... only to discover that the Germans have brought the war to the streets of London!This new volume of Charley's War features a brand new introduction and director's commentary' by Pat Mills, plus exclusive extra content.
author: Pat  Mills
